content:
Prev: The Sorting Hat Up: Timothy's Harry Potter 7th Birthday Party Next: Han-lin adds flobberworms to his potion

Searching for the Philosopher's Stone



Diana painted a stone bright red and hid it in the garden as a task for the kids to find it. Here Timothy and Conner look for it in the wrong corner of the yard.
Taken Sunday, February 26, 2006, 03:09:53PM. Original image size: 2048x3072, 1.8Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/500s @ F4.5, ISO 100, 50mm/F1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 6000:10, 1:3:50:50:0:25:25
